import React from 'react'; const CaseDetails = ({ caseData, onClose }) => { if (!caseData) return null; return (

Case Details

Case ID

{caseData._id}

Category

{caseData.category}

Priority

{caseData.priority}

Pending Years

{caseData.pending_years} years

Created At

{new Date(caseData.created_at).toLocaleString()}

Case Text

{caseData.case_text}

AI Summary

); }; export default CaseDetails;
